General.Name: China Times Publishing Co
General.Description: China Times Publishing Comp. publishes and sells Chinese books in Taiwan and internationally. Its publications include literature, fiction, prose, history, law, politics, religion, philosophy, humanities and society, culture, biographical, art, photography, film and television, DVD, VCD, CD, nature, science popularization, mathematical, tourism, common sense, comics, graphics, cartoons, parent-child, gender medicine, health care, beauty, children's books, picture books, fairy tale languages, education, learning encyclopedias, illustrated books, guide, diet, leisure, entertainment, psychology, inspirational, astrology, marketing, trends, financial, stationery, department stores, and others. China Times Publishing Comp. was founded in 1975 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 240, Heping West Road, Taipei, Taiwan, 108
